title: ArcSight Training
description: This ArcSight Training course teaches you all the essentials of the ArcSight solution, as well as provides information on how to design a complete solution. First, the course covers the basic operations of ArcSight, such as ArcSight download, install, deploy, troubleshoot, and more. Next, you’ll get a brief overview of ArcSight architecture, how to use the Console and Command Center to monitor security events, manage users, configure SIEM ArcSight, and ESM network intelligence resources. This online ArcSight Training also introduces you to searching and running reports with ArcSight Logger. Finally, you’ll gain the necessary hands-on expertise to clear ArcSight Certification through interactive labs and detailed use-cases.
what_will_learn: |ArcSight ESM (Enterprise Security Manager)|Log source onboarding & Log baselines|Logger Installation|Content creation on ESM|ESM Administration|Web Interference|
prerequisites: What are the prerequisites for joining this ArcSight Training?There is no specific prerequisite to get started with ArcSight. But, it’s recommended to have a basic understanding of security concepts before joining this ArcSight training to master the concepts easily in a shorter time.
instructor_bio: Vihari  has got 10+ of years of industrial experience working for global MNCs. He chose to deliver online training and contribute informative articles and blogs to various websites to share his technical expertise.
